name: Kill Bill Volume 1
storyline: When a member of the Deadly Viper Assassination squad led by 'Bill', realizes she is pregnant with his child, she decided to escape the life. She fled to Texas, met a man, and on the day of their wedding rehearsal, both of them were gunned down by Bill. Four years later, 'The Bride' wakes up from a coma to find that she had lost both her future husband and the baby. She then decides to seek revenge on Bill, and the team of assassians who destroyed her life.
